message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.AI, cs.DS

The paper discusses the issue of DDoS attacks generated by botnets, which is a common topic in the computer security (cs.CR) and networking (cs.NI) fields. The use of mobile portable devices and short-range wireless communications to coordinate botnets also suggests a potential overlap with the topics of mobile computing (cs.MO) and wireless communications (cs.IT). The paper also mentions the need for novel and intelligent-driven approaches, which could fall under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
